mentionedBy.name: Zscaler Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Single-vendor SASE built on SLA-backed global private backbone. Seamlessly integrates data centers, branch offices, mobile users, and cloud resources. Incorporates enterprise-grade network security stack. Recognized as a 2025 Gartner SASE Magic Quadrant Leader.
